languages.text: "Я не оскорблю тебя ложью, Инцендия. Это по моему приказу твой криосклеп был испорчен, а иные претенденты на наследство Аспис — убиты. Я признаю свое преступление".
"I will not offend you by telling a lie, Incendia. It was on my orders that your cryo-vault was tampered with and Aspyce's other aspiring heirs killed. I admit to my crime."
languages.original_text: "Я не оскорблю тебя ложью, Инцендия. Это по моему приказу твой криосклеп был испорчен, а иные претенденты на наследство Аспис — убиты. Я признаю свое преступление".

traits.locale_text: "I will not offend you by telling a lie, Incendia. It was on my orders that your cryo-vault was tampered with and Aspyce's other aspiring heirs were killed. I admit to my crime."
"I will not offend you by telling a lie, Incendia. It was on my orders that your cryo-vault was tampered with and Aspyce's other aspiring heirs were killed. I admit to my crime."
"I will not offend you by telling a lie, Incendia. It was on my orders that your cryo-vault was tampered with, and Aspyce's other aspiring heirs were killed. I admit to my crime."

"I will not offend you by telling a lie, Incendia. It was on my orders that your cryo-vault was tampered with and Aspyce's other aspiring heirs killed. I admit to my crime."
"I will not offend you by telling a lie, Incendia. It was on my orders that your cryo-vault was tampered with and Aspyce's other aspiring heirs killed. I admit to my crime."

languages.text: “我不会对你说谎，因森蒂娅。在我的授意下，我的人对你的冷冻舱做了手脚，而且阿斯拜丝其他的继承人也都死在了冷冻舱里。我承认我的罪行。”
languages.original_text: "I will not offend you by telling a lie, Incendia. It was on my orders that your cryo-vault was tampered with and Aspyce's other aspiring heirs killed. I admit to my crime."

traits.locale_text: “我不会对你说谎，因森蒂娅。在我的授意下，我的人对你的冷冻舱做了手脚，而且阿斯拜丝其他的继承人也都死在了冷冻舱里。我承认我的罪行。”

languages.text: 「私は嘘を付いてお前を侮辱したくない、インセンディア。お前の冷凍保管庫が改ざんされたのも、アスピスの他の後継者が殺されたのも、私の命令のせいだ。私は自身の罪を認める」
languages.original_text: "I will not offend you by telling a lie, Incendia. It was on my orders that your cryo-vault was tampered with and Aspyce's other aspiring heirs killed. I admit to my crime."

traits.locale_text: 「私は嘘を付いてお前を侮辱したくない、インセンディア。お前の冷凍保管庫が改ざんされたのも、アスピスの他の後継者が殺されたのも、私の命令のせいだ。私は自身の罪を認める」

languages.text: «No la ofenderé mintiendo, Incendia. Su criocámara fue manipulada y los otros aspirantes a herederos de Aspyce fueron asesinados bajo mis órdenes. Admito mi crimen».
languages.original_text: "I will not offend you by telling a lie, Incendia. It was on my orders that your cryo-vault was tampered with and Aspyce's other aspiring heirs killed. I admit to my crime."

traits.locale_text: «No la ofenderé mintiendo, Incendia. Su criocámara fue manipulada y los otros aspirantes a herederos de Aspyce fueron asesinados bajo mis órdenes. Admito mi crimen».

languages.text: "Ich werde Euch nicht beleidigen, indem ich lüge, Incendia. Euer Cryo-Grab wurde auf meinen Befehl hin manipuliert, und Aspyce' andere Erben wurden getötet. Ich gestehe mein Verbrechen."
languages.original_text: "I will not offend you by telling a lie, Incendia. It was on my orders that your cryo-vault was tampered with and Aspyce's other aspiring heirs killed. I admit to my crime."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde Euch nicht beleidigen, indem ich lüge, Incendia. Euer Cryo-Grab wurde auf meinen Befehl hin manipuliert, und Aspyce' andere Erben wurden getötet. Ich gestehe mein Verbrechen."

languages.text: « Je ne vous ferai pas l'injure de vous mentir, Incendia. En effet, c'est sur mon ordre que votre chambre cryogénique a été sabotée et que les autres héritiers d'Aspyce ont été tués. J'avoue mes crimes. »
languages.original_text: "I will not offend you by telling a lie, Incendia. It was on my orders that your cryo-vault was tampered with and Aspyce's other aspiring heirs killed. I admit to my crime."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne vous ferai pas l'injure de vous mentir, Incendia. En effet, c'est sur mon ordre que votre chambre cryogénique a été sabotée et que les autres héritiers d'Aspyce ont été tués. J'avoue mes crimes. »

languages.text: "Yalan söyleyerek seni öfkelendirmeyeceğim İncendia. Kriyomahzenin üzerinde benim emirlerimle oynandı ve Aspyce'nin diğer potansiyel vârisleri benim emrimle öldürüldü. Suçumu itiraf ediyorum."
languages.original_text: "I will not offend you by telling a lie, Incendia. It was on my orders that your cryo-vault was tampered with and Aspyce's other aspiring heirs killed. I admit to my crime."

traits.locale_text: "Yalan söyleyerek seni öfkelendirmeyeceğim İncendia. Kriyomahzenin üzerinde benim emirlerimle oynandı ve Aspyce'nin diğer potansiyel vârisleri benim emrimle öldürüldü. Suçumu itiraf ediyorum."
